query:
SELECT IFNULL(u.earned_tokens - IFNULL(SUM(s.tokens_used), 0), 0)
                FROM snapshots AS s 
                JOIN metadata AS m ON m.id = s.metadata_id
                JOIN buckets AS b ON b.id = m.bucket_id
                JOIN users AS u ON u.id = b.user_id
                WHERE u.id = $1;
